summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from February 1, 2015, to February 28, 2015. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance for the account, indicating significant financial activity during this period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $14,187,126.15 on February 1, 2015.
A transfer of $210,000.00 was made from the account on February 9, 2015.
The ending balance of the account as of February 28, 2015, was $14,191,351.76.
There were service charges totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to the account.
